snippet: The revelation comes after millions of burgers were taken off shop shelves this month as it emerged that beef products from three companies in Ireland and Britain contained horse DNA.
lead_paragraph: The revelation comes after millions of burgers were taken off shop shelves this month as it emerged that beef products from three companies in Ireland and Britain contained horse DNA.

headline.main: Lasagna Products Test Positive for Horsemeat in Britain
headline.print_headline: Britain: Lasagna Products Test Positive for Horse Meat
